verses.text: \w For|strong="H4616"\w* Sionâ€™s \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hold \w my|strong="H3318"\w* \w peace|strong="H8252"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H4616"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w her|strong="H5704"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w her|strong="H5704"\w* saviour \w be|strong="H3808"\w* lighted \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* lamp.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w just|strong="H0834"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* thy glorious \w one|strong="H3605"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w royal|strong="H4410"\w* \w diadem|strong="H6797"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thou shalt \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Forsaken: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Desolate|strong="H8077"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2654"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* inhabited. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w been|strong="H3808"\w* well \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* inhabited.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* dwell \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bridegroom \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bride|strong="H3618"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w Upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy wails, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w hold|strong="H2142"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* peace. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w hold|strong="H2142"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* peace,

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* silence \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w establish|strong="H3559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*: \w Surely|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thy corn \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* meat \w for|strong="H0518"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* strangers \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* thy \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast laboured.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w bring|strong="H0622"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* courts.

\w Go|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w*, \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \w prepare|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w make|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* plain, pick \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w standard|strong="H5251"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w made|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Sion: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* thy Saviour cometh: \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w reward|strong="H7939"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w work|strong="H6468"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w*: \w A|strong="H7121"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w after|strong="H1875"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* forsaken.
